title: 2 BEDROOM ~ Chehalis! Seniors!
posting_body: Welcome to Vintage at Chehalis Senior Apartment Homes are luxury apartments for mature adults ages 55 and over!
Located in desirable Chehalis, Washington, our community offers spacious apartment homes with resort style amenities.
At Vintage, you'll find places to relax, entertain, and energize.

• Social Room • Activity Room • Fitness Center • Beauty Shop • Movie Room • Business Center offering computers with high speed internet • Controlled Access Building • Elevator • Library • On-Site Management and Maintenance •
Public Transportation is readily accessible • Recycling in every trash area • Off street parking
• Energy Efficient Appliances • Refrigerator • Dishwasher • Garbage Disposal •
Many homes have great views • Patio or Balcony in all homes •
Our office is open Monday through Friday, tour appointments available from 10:00 AM to 4:00 PM
We are closed on the weekends.
